did.head: Collection Summary

origination.label: Creator:
origination.corpname: Church of Jesus Christ of Latter-day Saints. Zion Stake. Little Colorado.

did.abstract: Mormon missionaries settled in Arizona Territory on the Little Colorado River in 1876. The Stake of Zion was organized by them in January 1878. This collection contains minutes of quarterly conference meetings held at Sunset, Brigham City, St. Joseph, and other settlements in Arizona Territory.

repository.label: Repository:
repository.corpname: University of Arizona Libraries, Special Collections

accessrestrict.head: Restrictions
accessrestrict.p: Restricted; patrons use typescript copy at R9791 C559 L77.

prefercite.head: Credit Line
prefercite.p: Minutes of Quarterly Conference (AZ 174). Special Collections, University of Arizona Libraries.

bioghist.head: Biographical Note
bioghist.p: Mormon missionaries settled in Arizona Territory on the Little Colorado River in 1876. The Stake of Zion was organized by them in January 1878.

arrangement.head: Arrangement
arrangement.p: This collection is organized into chronological order.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Content Note
scopecontent.p: Minutes of quarterly conference meeting held at Sunset, Brigham City, St. Joseph, and other settlements in Arizona Territory, 1878-1886. Contains statistical reports of the stake. Begins with a history of the Little Colorado Mission, pp. 5-16, Jan. 16, 1876-Aug. 27, 1882.

item.subject: Mormons -- Colonization -- Little Colorado Region (N.M. and Ariz.) -- History -- Sources.
